metadata.description: Participating in class discussions for third-class

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 你好! 我是小美。让我们学习如何参与课堂讨论。

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: Say: 'I have a different perspective on this'

transcript.speaker: child
transcript.content: I have a different perspective on this

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 太棒了! Different views make discussions interesting!

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: You can also say: 'I agree with that point, and I'd like to add...'

transcript.speaker: child
transcript.content: I agree with that point, and I'd like to add...

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 好棒! You're building on others' ideas!
